reviews.review:
Has the best shooting mechanics in cs history.
Deleted scenes are better than the main condition zero.
Has interesting mechanics.
Fun to comeback and play after some time.
Graphics are great for its time.
Has some issues like "where the f*ck do I go" in some missions.
Some times spooky stuff happens like a suicide bomber explodes behind you like a creeper in minecraft.

overall 9/10 beat the whole game in 1 sitting.
volvo still support this game until now and still worth it
Aquele Counter Striker de fases hahaha eu me envolvi muito nesse game, e perdi algumas horinhas nele tambÃ©m! Recomendo D+...
A very nice installment of the Counter-Strike series. If you don't have a lot of money, get CS 1.6, but if you are fans of the series and have too much money, it's worth it.

Pra quem estÃ¡ em duvida em qual Ã© o cs 1.6 normal usado para jogar em servidores online, nos pacotes em baixo na descriÃ§Ã£o vai estar os nomes dos jogos que vem, o normal esta escrito apenas como "counter-strike", caso queira apenas ele, recomendo comprarem o primeiro pacote, Ã© um Ã³timo jogo a final!!
An offline storyline addon for CS 1.6, really old so not perfect. 7/10

Imo CSCZ's idea was amazing. The idea of a CS-style fast shooter with real-life police siege tactics was so good, but CSS overshadowed CSCZ, simply because CSS had a new engine and CSCZ was using the original Half-Life engine. If CSCZ was actually a Source game, it would be so popular, but it isn't. If someone makes a new Tour of Duty CS game, it would certainly become very popular. You have to keep in mind that if we had a CS game with both singleplayer and multiplayer, you didn't have to complain about the gamemodes, you had lots of options. If i wanted to play with bots in CSCZ, i usually made my own server, added bots and simply just made it more fun and i used non-Tour of Duty maps such as 747 or Vostok and it was so much fun. But what was the past is kind of forgotten. I like that people actually are nowadays interested about CSCZ and its deleted scenes, it shows that old forgotten games can be even more fun than the hyped games. 

not to forget that this game had one of the best CS soundtracks/theme, unlike CSS which didnt have absolutely nothing.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-FHNv3qPXFA
Very fun, got it when on sale and a quality game

Have you ever wanted a single-player story campaign for Counter-Strike? Well here it is.

I didn't intend to actually play this game because it just came with the bundle i got this from but it turns out to be quite fun. It's pretty much cs 1.6 but with added singleplayer campaign, if you want that and regular multiplayer, give this game a shot.
